author: nacho
msg: Added i18n to DefaultServlet ( default directory service )
and to DefaultErrorPage Servlet.

author: shachor
msg: Added a sample load balancing worker configuration.

author: shachor
msg: Should fix the ThreadDeath bug as reported by Christian Seiler
c.seiler@cassiopeia.com

author: shachor
msg: SSL parameters support. Apache may have several different
SSL implementations. Since mod_jk extracts the information
from the environment we need the name of the SSL environment
variables to be configurable. This is what this fix is all about.
We can now configure:
1. The name of the HTTPS environment variable
2. The name of the HTTPS_CIPHER environment variable
3. The name of the SSL_CLIENT_CERT environment variable
Default values match those used by apache-ssl

author: shachor
msg: Bug fixes + SSL parameters support. scheme snd isSecure should
now work. The ciphers and client certs (if available in the server)
should be accessible through the request attributes along with the
SSL session
All this as long as you are using ajp13. Should work on JNI support in
The near future.
